item.title: In need of some help for my DoorManager
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I wrote a door manager and it works flawless, as long as there aren’t more doors with the same ID.

for (Door door : doors) {
			if (door != null) {
				if (door.getId() == doorId) {
					if (door.getX() == doorX && door.getY() == doorY) {

When it checks for the coordinates and there are multiple doors with the same ID,
it stops when the first of the index doesn’t fit the coords and doesn’t continue to check the other indexes.
I need to create some kind of loop but I can’t seem to succeed also I think there are better ways.

Somebody that could help me fixing this?

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
item.source: In need of some help for my DoorManager
